what-is-a-set.title: Sets are for Asset Management
what-is-a-set.subtitle: A Set is like a digital fund that trades cryptocurrencies to help grow your wealth.

set-products.product-subtitle: Deposit your funds into a Set, and automatically enact that portfolio's strategy.

wallet-setup.title: Get Started
wallet-setup.step-one-main: Login with your favorite Ethereum Wallet
wallet-setup.step-two-secondary: using an exchange like Coinbase or Binance.

fund-your-wallet.title: Fund Your Wallet
fund-your-wallet.subtitle: ETH is used to buy and sell Sets on TokenSets
fund-your-wallet.eth-address-label: Send ETH to your wallet using this address or QR code:
fund-your-wallet.add-more-funds-later: You can add more ETH later on your Account page

finish-onboarding.title: Pick your strategy
finish-onboarding.buying-a-set: Any money deposited into a Set will be used to automatically execute the strategy you choose.
finish-onboarding.selling-a-set: Sell your Set to claim your deposit plus or minus any gains or losses your Set makes.
